thread.title: Hull City v Liverpool, LIVE scores: Plus other EPL results | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Hull City v Liverpool, LIVE scores: Plus other EPL results | Daily Mail Online

author: Dan Ripley For Mailonline
title: Hull City v Liverpool, LIVE scores: Plus other EPL results | Daily Mail Online
text:
From new Crystal Palace defender Mamadou Sakho, on loan from Liverpool 13:39 LIVE: Chelsea v Arsenal (12.30pm) - click here for all the action as it happens 
First up though make sure you keep tabs on the 12.30pm action as it's a pivotal London derby concerning the title race as Chelsea host Arsenal. 
The second half has just kicked off at the Emirates Stadium so click here to join Sportsmail's Adam Shergold for all the action. On this page though it's all about the 3pm matches. 13:34 It's a massive afternoon coming up in the Premier League relegation battle 
Because while the 3pm action perhaps lacks the majority of the title chasing teams, there is an almighty scrap going on at the other end of the table. 
The bottom three are all in action (two play each other!) as they look to put pressure on Swansea City and Leicester City immediately outside the relegation zone who play tomorrow. 
Good afternoon all and welcome to Sportsmail's coverage of six 3pm Premier League matches.
